survey.res: RESPONDENT MUST PICK UP A PRODUCT IN ORDER TO PURCHASE IT
YOU MUST SELECT AT LEAST ONE PRODUCT FOR PURCHASE
Please select aware of for all products owned.
You cannot select 'None' and also make a selection.
You must make a selection or select 'None'.
Please be as detailed and thorough as possible
Please be as detailed and thorough as possible
SHOPPING TIME MUST BE GREATER THAN 0 SECONDS
SHOPPING TIME MUST BE GREATER THAN 0 SECONDS
THE PRODUCT LOOKED AT BACK OF PACK, MUST BE SELECTED PRODUCT PICKED UP

block.label: Logistics

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Location
radio.row: Oi Research- Online Interactive Research Limited

radio.label: Phase
radio.title: Phase

radio.label: Version
radio.title: Version

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

block.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company

html.label: Intro
html.p: GOOD MORNING/AFTERNOON/EVENING. I AM ________ FROM BEHAVIORALLY. WE ARE CONDUCTING RESEARCH ON PEOPLE'S REACTIONS TO VARIOUS CONSUMER PRODUCTS. I WONDER IF YOU COULD SPARE 20 MINUTES TO ANSWER SOME QUESTIONS?

autofill.label: Months
autofill.title: Enter number of months here 1,3,6,12 for past purchased, BUMO

block.label: Screener

checkbox.label: S1
checkbox.title: Have you participated in a marketing research survey about any of the following in the past 3 months?
checkbox.comment: READ LIST - SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

checkbox.label: S2
checkbox.title: Do you or anyone in your family, work for any of the following industries?
checkbox.comment: READ LIST - IF ANY MENTIONED, TERMINATE. SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
checkbox.row: A graphic design or packaging firm
A company that manufactures, distributes or sells toy products
Entertainment industry (acting, theater, TV, writer communications, broadcasting or cable TV)
Member of the media (Newspaper/magazine publishing, radio or TV broadcasting, internet or other electronic media, etc.)

number.label: S3
number.title: May I have your age please?

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: With which gender do you identify most?

radio.label: S4
radio.title: Do you have any children aged between 7 years and 10 years living at home?

pipe.label: S5Text
pipe.case: What is the gender of the child aged between 7 year and 10 years living in your home?
What is the gender of your oldest child aged between 7 years and 10 years living in your home?

radio.label: S5
radio.title: [pipe: S5Text]

textarea.label: S_Name
textarea.title: What is the name of your child who is a [pipe: S5] aged 7-10

block.html: From now on we will refer to [pipe:S_Name] throughout the interview.

radio.label: S_Avail
radio.title: Is [pipe:S_Name] available to participate in the interview with you? We will ask you some questions first and then we would like to ask your child a short set of questions for that will last about five minutes

checkbox.label: S_BRAND
checkbox.title: Thinking specifically about toy brands, which of the following are owned by [pipe: S_Name]?

checkbox.label: S_LEGO
checkbox.title: Which of the following LEGO sets are owned by [pipe: S_Name] and which are you aware of?
checkbox.comment: Select as many sets as applicable for each. Please make sure you also select 'aware of' for all sets that your child owns.
checkbox.validate: if (S_LEGO.r1.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r1.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r2.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r2.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r3.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r3.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r4.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r4.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r5.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r5.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r6.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r6.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r7.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r7.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r8.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r8.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r9.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r9.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)) or (S_LEGO.r10.c2 and not(S_LEGO.r10.c1) and not(S_LEGO.None.c1)): error(res.LEGOError)

radio.label: S_LEGOEMOTION
radio.title:
Thinking about [pipe: S_Name].
Overall, building with building bricks makes my child feel...

radio.label: S_LEGOLOVE
radio.title: How does [pipe: S_Name] feel about LEGO? The more they love LEGO, the more your circle should overlap with LEGO’s circle. The less you love LEGO, the less the circles should overlap.
radio.comment: Select one response for each row

autofill.label: Usage
autofill.title: Usage Past Purchased (P3M, P6M, P12M) FULL LIST break out - netted where needed

autofill.label: BUMO
autofill.title: BUMO FULL LIST break out - netted where needed

autofill.label: User
autofill.title: This is "user" as defined by the insights team - the user by which they are running their data in crosstabs (and thus the norms)- this is defined as either past purchased or BUMO – as instructed by insights. Logic will be the same as S_Brand_PastPurchased OR S_Brand_BUMO.

number.label: resp_id
number.title: Respondent ID

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

text.label: Agreement
text.title:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure and Safety Agreement (RCDSA)
Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand the following:
In the course of this market research study you will be presented with confidential information on newly developed ideas and products (e.g. prototypes, advertising, packaging, etc.) which are not yet available in their present form and hence unknown to the public.
Before you can participate you must agree to hold in the strictest confidence all information you will see or hear during the study and anything associated with it and to not disclose any such information to any other party under any circumstances.
You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by signing and dating this agreement in the space provided below.
I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

survey.html:
Thank you for completing the exercise, please alert your supervisor and proceed to the next room
Supervisor: Please close out the tab on the computer browser and bring the respondent to the next station.
 
Use the respondent number below to re-open the link on other devices.
Respondent Number: [pipe: Resp]
If needed, tap here to start a new blank screener for a new respondent.

block.label: ShoppingSection
block.builder:title: Shopping Section

pipe.label: continue_text
pipe.case: Please click the Continue button to proceed

pipe.label: QuantityPurchasedText
pipe.case:
Assume that you have come to the store today to buy a gift or gifts for the children in your household. In a moment, I am going to show you a display of toys products that you might find in your store. When I do, I’d like you to approach the display and go shopping from it, as if you were actually in the store making your purchases.
There is no limit on how many products you may purchase, but please be aware of the prices you see in this display, and the typical amount that you would spend on these products.
When you see a product that you would like to purchase, please place it in your basket and let me know the brand name and the variety. Let me know when you have finished by saying “okay”. You may take as much or as little time as you would like to complete this exercise.

Assume that you have come to the store today to buy a gift or gifts for the children in your household. In a moment, I am going to show you a display of toys products that you might find in your store. When I do, I’d like you and your child to approach the display and go shopping from it, as if you were actually in the store making your purchases. Please allow your child to have the same involvement in the process as they would in reality
There is no limit on how many products you may purchase, but please be aware of the prices you see in this display, and the typical amount that you would spend on these products.
When you see a product that you would like to purchase, please place it in your basket and let me know the brand name and the variety. Let me know when you have finished by saying “okay”. You may take as much or as little time as you would like to complete this exercise.

block.note: PROGRAMMER NOTE: AUTOFILL LOGIC FOR TB MUST BE UPDATED "P1_Items_Bought.r1 or P1_Items_Bought.r2" etc... for all the test products on shelf. Verify with insights team which are test products before writing the logic.
PROGRAMMER NOTE: AUTOFILL LOGIC FOR THE MAIN 2 COMPETITORS IN THE SHOPPING LIST - THIS IS FOR REPORTING PURPOSES AND MUST BE POPULATED

comment.div:
CONFIRM THAT RESPONDENT UNDERSTANDS THE INSTRUCTIONS, AND RE-READ IF NECESSARY.
THEN, HAVE RESPONDENT TURN AND APPROACH THE SHELF.
START THE STOPWATCH ONCE RESPONDENT IS FACING THE SHELF.
BE SURE THAT YOU ARE STANDING BEHIND THEM AND OFF TO THE SIDE, TO AVOID BLOCKING THEIR PATH.
RECORD ALL PRODUCTS AND QUANTITIES SELECTED FOR PURCHASE UNDER P1.

number.label: P_QuantityPurchased
PurchaseDuration
number.comment: Enter one digit in each box (including zeros).

float.label: ShopTimeSeconds
float.title: Shopping Time (Seconds)
float.exec: ShopTimeSeconds.val = PurchaseDuration.c1.ival*60 + PurchaseDuration.c2.ival*10.0 + PurchaseDuration.c3.ival*1.0 + PurchaseDuration.c4.ival/10.0 + PurchaseDuration.c5.ival/100.0

textarea.label: P4
textarea.title: Thinking back to the shopping trip you just completed, please tell us all of the different LEGO brands and products you remember seeing on the shelf?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible

textarea.label: P5
textarea.title: Did you notice any LEGO brands or products on the shelf that you weren’t previously aware of?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible

checkbox.label: P6
checkbox.title: And which LEGO brands and products listed on this card do you remember seeing on the shelf?

textarea.label: P7
textarea.title: Thinking back to the shopping trip you just completed, were there any products you didn’t purchase that you would consider adding to your wishlist for the future?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible

block.label: Findability_Section
block.builder:title: Findability Section
block.html:
Now, I am going to show you the display of toys again. When I show you the display, I’d like you to approach the shelf and find LEGO Dreamzzz [pipe: Finda].
When you find the product, please say “okay” and point to the product. If you are ready, let’s begin. (IF RESPONDENT UNDERSTANDS, CONTINUE WITH THE STEPS BELOW.)
(READ:) I am going to count down “3-2-1, GO” and then I would like you to turn around and walk up to the display. Again, you are looking for Lego Dreamzzz [pipe: Finda]
(READ:) Ready? 3-2-1. GO
START STOPWATCH AS SHELF IS SHOWN. WHEN RESPONDENT SAYS “OKAY” AFTER FINDING THE SPECIFIC PRODUCT, STOP THE STOPWATCH AND CHECK WHICH PRODUCT THEY ARE POINTING TO. RECORD TIME SHOWN ON THE STOPWATCH EXACTLY AS IT APPEARS.

radio.label: F1
radio.title:
Again, you are looking for:
[pipe: Finda]

number.label: FindDuration
number.comment: Enter one digit in each box (including zeros).

float.label: FindTimeSeconds
float.title: Find Time (Seconds)
float.exec: FindTimeSeconds.val = FindDuration.c1.ival*60 + FindDuration.c2.ival*10.0 + FindDuration.c3.ival*1.0 + FindDuration.c4.ival/10.0 + FindDuration.c5.ival/100.0

radio.label: vFindCorrect
F4
radio.title: Using the statements on this card, how easy or difficult do you think it was to find the LEGO Dreamzzz [pipe: Finda] in this display?
radio.row: Neither easy nor difficult to find

checkbox.label: F5
checkbox.title: Did you experience any of the following challenges when you tried to find the product on the shelf?
checkbox.row: Colour does not stand out on shelf
Not enough models to allow theme to stand out on shelf
Too many LEGO products to choose from
Packaging is too busy/ there is too much going on
Packaging is too similar to other LEGO themes

radio.label: F6
radio.title: Using the statements on this card, how easy or difficult do you think it is to differentiate between the different sets in the LEGO Dreamzzz theme?
radio.row: Very easy to tell the difference
Somewhat easy to tell the difference
Neither easy nor difficult to tell the difference
Somewhat difficult to tell the difference
Very difficult to tell the difference

textarea.label: F8
textarea.cond: P_PickUp.r123.c1 or P_PickUp.r124.c1 or P_PickUp.r125.c1 or P_PickUp.r126.c1 or P_PickUp.r127.c1 or P_PickUp.r128.c1
textarea.title: Why did you purchase the LEGO Dreamzzz products?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible

textarea.label: F9
textarea.cond: not(P_PickUp.r123.c1 or P_PickUp.r124.c1 or P_PickUp.r125.c1 or P_PickUp.r126.c1 or P_PickUp.r127.c1 or P_PickUp.r128.c1)
textarea.title: Why did you not purchase the LEGO Dreamzzz products?
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible

survey.html:
Thank you for completing the exercise, please alert your supervisor and proceed to the next room
Supervisor: Please close out the tab on the computer browser and bring the respondent to the next station.
 
Use the respondent number below to re-open the link on other devices.
Respondent Number: [pipe: Resp]
If needed, tap here to bring up a new respondent for rescreening.

block.label: FlashExposure
block.html: You are now going to see a picture on the screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be a very short exposure.

checkbox.label: F_Practice
checkbox.title: Please review the image below. After 1/2 second, you will automatically be advanced to the next page.

textarea.label: F_Practice_OE
textarea.title: Please describe everything you saw, even if you are not sure about it.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html: You are now going to see a picture on the screen. Please pay attention as it’s going to be a very short exposure.

checkbox.label: F_Flash1
checkbox.title: Please review the image below. After 3 second, you will automatically be advanced to the next page.

textarea.label: F_Flash1_OE
textarea.title: Please describe everything you saw, even if you are not sure about it.
textarea.comment: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.note: PROGRAMMER NOTE: IF Fit, Und and Usual are included - they must be choice 1, 2, 3 and NOT randomized. Labels must stay as is for Norms
PROGRAMMER NOTE: Usual - ask if Past buyers Past purchased selectes Test Brand -- logic is built in: cond="S_Brand_PastPurchased.TB"
Flash3 statement "Clear" is only for Core and Plus. It is not standard for 360 but I gave it a standard label for reporting

radio.label: F_Flash3
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that the following phrases apply to this product based on what you have just seen?

ul.ul:
10 means that you strongly agree with the statement.
1 means that you strongly disagree with the statement.

div.strong: You may choose any number from 1 to 10 that best describes your opinion.

strong.span: Based on what you have just seen, would you say that.

radio.row: This is a good toy for both boys and girls
My child would be interested in this
It fits well with what I expect from LEGO
This looks like an exciting world to play in
I would like to know more about the story
This seems different from other LEGO themes
I'm interested in seeing other sets in this theme
This looks like an exciting build

radio.label: Straightliner_Flash3
radio.title: DO NOT REMOVE OR MODIFY - Straightliner Punch - Just Tracking for Flash3

textarea.label: Q_Likes_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Using your mouse, please highlight the items/aspects of the packaging you like most.
textarea.validate: if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)

checkbox.label: Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.validate: if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Likes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_LikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)
checkbox.row: I don’t like any of it

textarea.label: Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Using your mouse, please highlight the items/aspects of the packaging you like the least.
textarea.validate: if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)

checkbox.label: Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.validate: if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val != "" and Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1: error(res.MapError) if Q_Dislikes_[loopvar: label].c1.val == "" and not(Q_DislikesNone_[loopvar: label].r1): error(res.MapError2)
checkbox.row: I don’t dislike any of it

survey.html:
Please now contact your interviewer.
Interviewer: Please place the Turtle Van Dream Shop and Croc Truck products on the table.

textarea.label: Spontaneous_reaction
textarea.title:
The packaging that products come in can often convey certain impressions of the brand and the products inside. Please take a moment to examine the packaging of these products.
What, if anything, do you think is new or different about these toys and the world they’re set in?
Please be as detailed and thorough as possible

survey.html: For the next few questions, please focus your attention on the LEGO packaging you see here.

radio.label: Q_OA
radio.title: How much does the LEGO Dreamzzz packaging appeal to you?

checkbox.label: Q_PackAtt
checkbox.title: You will now see some words and phrases that could be used to describe the appearance of various products. Do you think the LEGO Dreamzz packaging is…

quota.label: QTPack
quota.cond: Q_PackAtt.r3 or Q_PackAtt.r5 or Q_PackAtt.r6 or Q_PackAtt.r8

radio.label: Q_COMP
radio.cond: PackText.r1 or PackText.r2 or PackText.r3 or PackText.r4
radio.title: You mentioned the LEGO Dreamzzz theme is [pipe: PackText]. Thinking about other LEGO themes your children have at home, do you think LEGO Dreamzzz is…

radio.label: Q_Communication
radio.title: [pipe: PH_IMG]
radio.comment: You will now see various phrases that could be used to describe children’s building toys. How much do you agree or disagree that the following phrases apply to this LEGO Dreamzzz theme?
radio.row: This theme is for both boys and girls
This theme is for kids aged 7-10
My child would get a lot of build out of this set
I understand how a child would play with this theme
The models in this theme look like good builds
This theme is more interesting than other LEGO themes
I would be interested in purchasing a set from this theme for my child
This looks like an exciting world to play in
I would like to know more about the story

radio.label: Straightliner
radio.title: DO NOT REMOVE OR MODIFY - Straightliner Punch

radio.label: Q_PI
radio.title: How likely would you be to buy from the LEGO DREAMZZ range for [pipe:S_Name], assuming a price that was acceptable for you?

radio.label: Q_BOP_Communication
radio.title: [pipe: BOP_IMG]
radio.comment: Focusing on the back of the box, please tell us to what degree you would agree or disagree with the following statements.
radio.row: It is easy to understand what the LEGO Dreamzzz theme is all about
I understand how a child would play with this set
I understand why a child would want to play with this set
My child would get a lot of play out of this set
Seeing the back of the box makes me more interested in purchasing this set for my child
This theme is more interesting than other LEGO themes

radio.label: Straightliner_BOP
radio.title: DO NOT REMOVE OR MODIFY - Straightliner Punch

checkbox.label: Q_LogoAtt
checkbox.title: I would now like you to concentrate on the name of the product. A number of people have said some words and phrases on the name and the way that it is written. Do you think the Dreamzzz logo is…

radio.label: Q_Understanding
radio.title: Based on the box design, how well do you feel you understand what this theme is about?

survey.exec:
p.Order = [0,1]
random.shuffle(p.Order)
print p.Order Q_TitanComp3_1.rows.order = p.Order Q_TitanComp3_2.rows.order = p.Order Q_TitanComp3_3.rows.order = p.Order Q_TitanComp3_4.rows.order = p.Order Q_TitanComp3_5.rows.order = p.Order Q_TitanComp3_6.rows.order = p.Order

radio.label: Q_TitanComp3_1
radio.title: We are now going to show you an alternative version of the pack you have seen so far. You may notice that one version of the pack has an additional mini-figure in the bottom left hand corner of the pack. Looking at both versions of the packaging, to what extent do you agree or disagree that each one applies to the following statements?

comment.span: It helps you to understand the theme

radio.label: Q_TitanComp3_2
radio.title: We are now going to show you an alternative version of the pack you have seen so far. You may notice that one version of the pack has an additional mini-figure in the bottom left hand corner of the pack. Looking at both versions of the packaging, to what extent do you agree or disagree that each one applies to the following statements?

comment.span: It is for both boys and girls

radio.label: Q_TitanComp3_3
radio.title: We are now going to show you an alternative version of the pack you have seen so far. You may notice that one version of the pack has an additional mini-figure in the bottom left hand corner of the pack. Looking at both versions of the packaging, to what extent do you agree or disagree that each one applies to the following statements?

comment.span: It makes you think this is an exciting world

radio.label: Q_TitanComp3_4
radio.title: We are now going to show you an alternative version of the pack you have seen so far. You may notice that one version of the pack has an additional mini-figure in the bottom left hand corner of the pack. Looking at both versions of the packaging, to what extent do you agree or disagree that each one applies to the following statements?

comment.span: It makes the theme look interesting

radio.label: Q_TitanComp3_5
radio.title: We are now going to show you an alternative version of the pack you have seen so far. You may notice that one version of the pack has an additional mini-figure in the bottom left hand corner of the pack. Looking at both versions of the packaging, to what extent do you agree or disagree that each one applies to the following statements?

comment.span: It makes the model look exciting

radio.label: Q_TitanComp3_6
radio.title: We are now going to show you an alternative version of the pack you have seen so far. You may notice that one version of the pack has an additional mini-figure in the bottom left hand corner of the pack. Looking at both versions of the packaging, to what extent do you agree or disagree that each one applies to the following statements?

comment.span: It helps you to understand that the theme is set in a dream world

block.label: Kids_section
block.builder:title: Child Survey
block.html: We would now like you to ask [pipe: S_Name] to come to the computer and answer some questions. If you think they will need help answering the questions then please assist them, but we want to know their opinions

Hello [pipe: S_Name].
Thank you for helping us. We would like to ask you some questions. This will help us to make LEGO that you will enjoy the most.

textarea.label: Q_Spontaneous_Child
textarea.title:
Please take a look at the LEGO packaging on the table in front of you. Please take your time to look over the packs
Now, in your own words, please describe these LEGO toys as if I was one of your friends who had never seen it before. Please describe in as much detail as you can
What will the Lego toys be like to play with?

radio.label: Q_OA_Child
radio.title: How much do you like or dislike the LEGO Dreamzzz models?

radio.label: Q_Communication_Child
radio.title: [pipe: Child_IMG]
radio.comment: Some other children have made descriptions of these packs. Now please tell me how much you agree with their descriptions of the LEGO Dreamzzz packaging
radio.row: This is a good toy for both boys and girls
This looks like an exciting world to play in
I would like to know more about the story
This theme is more interesting than other LEGO themes
I'm interested in seeing other sets in this theme
LEGO Dreamzzz is for a kid like me.

radio.label: Straightliner_Child
radio.title: DO NOT REMOVE OR MODIFY - Straightliner Punch

strong.em: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes...

radio.label: C_STORE
radio.title: Where do you typically buy LEGO?
radio.row: At a physical store only (like a pharmacy, grocery store or mass merchandiser)
Mostly online and occasionally at a physical store
Mostly at a physical store and occasionally online
Both online and at a physical store equally

checkbox.label: C_DEVICES
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought LEGO online, what devices do you use to shop for LEGO online?

checkbox.label: C_ONLINE_STORES
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought LEGO online, where specifically?

checkbox.label: C_DELIVERY
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought LEGO online, how do you usually get the LEGO product after you buy it?
checkbox.row: Buy online and pick up at the store
Buy online and get it delivered to my home
Buy online and get it delivered to my work
Buy online and get it delivered to a locker or place where I can pick it up

select.label: C_Employment
select.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?

select.label: STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
select.choice: Other post high school vocational training
Completed some college, but no degree
Completed some graduate, but no degree

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
select.title: Please select the range that best represents your total annual household income.
